title: Jaguar Land Rover to use Pirelli's natural rubber tyres in sustainability push
description: The Forest Stewardship Council (FSC) certified natural rubber tyres will be first seen on JLR's new Range Rover Electric, the Tata Motors owned automaker said on Thursday. FSC is a global standards body for sustainable forest management.
